abstract: Coalition for the Future of Detroit Schoolchildren issues extensive proposal that would address crisis in city's educational system and return governance of Detroit's public school system to an elected school board that has been largely sidelined, since 2009, under an appointed emergency manager.
lead_paragraph: The proposal by city leaders would end emergency management and return control to an elected school board.

headline.main: Detroit Group Calls for Overhaul of Schools
headline.print_headline: Detroit Group Calls for Overhaul of Schools

snippet: The proposal by city leaders would end emergency management and return control to an elected school board.
